instructions: put the dinner fork at the bottom left of the table cloth
put the dinner knife at the bottom right of the table cloth, its blade facing left
put the salad fork on the left of the fork
put the salad knife on the right of the knife, its blade facing left
put the soup spoon on the right of the salad knife
put the dessert spoon at the top center of the table cloth, its bowl pointing left
move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon, its bowl pointing up
move the dessert spoon back to the top center of the table cloth, its bowl pointing left
put the dinner plate between the forks and the knives
put the bread plate on the top left of the table cloth, above the forks
put the butter knife diagonally on the bread plate, its blate pointing down left
put the wine glass above the soup sppon
put the water glass above the knives
put the napkin on the dinner plate
